mapper.select: /* 상품 목록 조회 */ SELECT g.goods_code ,m.id ,g.goods_name ,ccs.category_code_sub ,g.goods_image ,g.goods_price ,g.goods_quantity FROM goods AS g INNER JOIN member AS m ON m.id = g.id INNER JOIN company_category_sub AS ccs ON g.category_code_sub = ccs.category_code_sub ORDER BY g.goods_price DESC;
mapper.insert:
SELECT (CASE -- 상품이 없을 경우 WHEN count(g.goods_code) = 0 THEN 'gc001_4' -- 999개 등록되어 있을 경우 WHEN (Max(CAST(substring_index(g.goods_code,'gc',-1) AS UNSIGNED))+1) > 999 THEN concat('gc',Max(CAST(substring_index(g.goods_code,'gc',-1) AS UNSIGNED))+1) -- 1~999 범위일 경우 ELSE concat('gc',LPAD(Max(CAST(substring_index(g.goods_code,'gc',-1) AS UNSIGNED))+1,3,0)) END) AS goodsCode FROM goods AS g;
/* 상품 등록 */ INSERT INTO goods (goods_code, company_member_code, category_code_sub, id, goods_name, goods_price, goods_image, goods_quantity, registration_datetime, goods_contents) VALUES( #{goodsCode}, 'cmc004', #{categoryCodeSub}, 'id004', #{goodsName}, #{goodsPrice}, #{goodsImage}, #{goodsQuantiy}, NOW(), #{goodsContents});
mapper.select: /* 상품 문의 목록 */ SELECT q.goods_QnA_answer ,g.goods_name ,m.id ,q.goods_QnA_title ,q.goods_QnA_datetime FROM goods_QnA AS q INNER JOIN member AS m ON q.id = m.id INNER JOIN goods AS g ON q.goods_code = g.goods_code;
